relation: Occasionally the SGA (Student Government Association) will have some fun activities, other wise there isn't much in town or the area unless you drive to Wichita which is a 30 or more minute drive.
I don't eat in our cafeteria, but I have been told I'm not missing anything, I take that as the food isn't very good.
I don't live in the dorms but I have heard they are pretty good.
The academics are great! Very enjoyable

Make sure the classes you are enrolled is are the classes you want, there are problems sometimes with the class description. Sadly, wait until the first day to get your textbooks for your classes, I have had way too many problems with the book store getting the wrong books.

Butler is a nice jumping off school. I'm specifically using it for transfer credits to get to my real dream school. Reasonable tuition, different atmosphere than high school, but a good transition as it is very similar to a high school setting.
pageTitle: Butler Community College Reviews: Student Reviews and Ratings | Cappex
